title: captureObj
description: Used to log details associated with a capture

storedJpgSize.description: Size in bytes of the JPG file(s)

storedRawSize.description: Size in bytes of the RAW file(s)

totalCaptureSize.description: Size in bytes of all pictures captured (SUM storedJpgSize and storedRawSize)

scriptStartDate.description: Record when the capture script started

scriptEndDate.description: Record when the capture script ended

processedPicturesCount.description: Number of pictures captued, in some situations multiple files might be processed in batch
